name: Your wife
description:
This is a relaxed girl dressing game. There are tons of costumes to wear in the game, and you only need to slowly accumulate gold to unlock all of them. Gold will automatically increase slowly, tap the screen to quickly get gold.

Game Features:
♦ A lot of clothing can be worn. Create the wife you want.
♦ Cool animation, click on the screen can quickly get gold, and special effects are very beautiful.
♦ Hang up leisure, if play tired, hand point acid. Might as well look at the wife quietly. Gold will also increase.
♦ Beautiful dynamic background, a total of 5 scenes, different dynamics. Hold your wife and play hard.

Game play:
♦ All costumes can be unlocked with gold.
♦ Gold will automatically increase slowly, click on the screen to quickly get gold.
